start.text: Drink deep of the Fuming God's breath.
Drink deep of the Fuming God's breath =player.formalAddressTerm=. But not too deeply.
The shallow world is so strange...
The Aji will never believe these sights.
No other Aji has tread this path.
Maintaining this capsule leaves me hungry...
The weight of this world, light as pumice.
start.choice: Wise Aji, how are you finding Qud?
Wise Aji, pass on the Fuming God's insight.

node.text: Breathe deep =player.formalAddressTerm=.
Fuming God watch you =player.formalAddressTerm=.
Is there more, =player.formalAddressTerm=.
What else is on your mind?
node.choice: Wise Aji, how are you finding Qud?
Wise Aji, pass on the Fuming God's insight.

node.text: There are many unfamiliar liquids. They are cold and slippery.
Salt crystals are everywhere. Some things don’t change.
It is so bright, much of the time.
So many chrome-children. The Fuming God speaks obliquely of them.
I miss the rites with the God-Children. And the offerings.
There are so many children, stacked atop one another, biting, screaming.
It is grander and messier than the Dromads described.
It is strange, stranger than even the God-Children described.
The Spindle… it haunts my dreams.
The earth is as porous as home. But colder, and full of more dead things.
The taste of life, of death. It is everywhere. It is overwhelming.
Rock or water, there are waves. Let the waves carry you.
You will change. It will burn. You will endure.
There are such wonders on this wave. Care for it well.
In time, all will be ash. Live now.
First, you must breath.
When all else fails, breath.
As thanks, give care.
We are all children. Some are old children.
Respect the Aji.
Drink deep of the Fuming God's breath. Loosen the self, and see the waves.
Inhale volcanic gases responsibly.
